about_the_game:
This poor little granny needs to get out of her retirement home, but they just won't let her out!
The thing is, she's not very fast with her walker.
She'll need to be sneaky and use her wits to pass through staff, cameras and all kinds of security and escape!
The game is made to be humorous, yet carry a serious tone with what has been happening in the times of the pandemic.
Not all games need to be about guns and muscles, and with the average age getting higher every year, it is interesting to have older people represented to have stories that reflect them.



Gameplay
Using simple inputs, you control Rose a little Granny that doesn’t want to spend her last days in a closed off retirement home.
Move around on a grid. Hide behind objects. Hide in Plants. Take pills for speed boosts. Use dentures as decoys. Whatever it takes to get out.



Features
• Over 70 levels to start and extra chapters coming soon
• Simple controls
• Gets challenging as you progress
• A funny yet engaging story
• Unlockable levels
• unlockable costumes for Granny (yes, stealth can be done with style!)
• A game that is as fun to play then it is to watch being played.
